data.actual_result: It doesn't show the group name and icon but when you join the group, and look at the modal again, it fixes itself.
data.expected_result: It shows the group DM name and icon and doesn't show an online count.
data.short_description: When you receive an invite for a group DM you are/were not a part of, the invite modal shows no group name or group icon. It shows the online membercount for some reason but even that is always 0 no matter what. Joining the group DM fixes it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ask someone to send you an invite for a group DM you are/were not a part. - Observe the invite modal.
